title: Remembering Donald Trump's 2016 Voter Fraud Claims - These American Lies
itunes:title: Remembering Donald Trump's 2016 Voter Fraud Claims - These American Lies
description:
Desi Lydic and Michael Kosta unpack President Trump’s claim that 3 to 5 million people voted illegally in the 2016 presidential election.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
